values: I am so tired.  I am almost finished but I might not make it. I forgot what I was going to actually write about. crap.   ugg.  Its four in the morning.
live journal sucks. i keep accidently deleting my entries. i'm just not gunna try anymore.
I'm exhausted.  This weekend was crazy!  My Dad came to visit though and I was the happiest I've been since I saw Shane in the summer.  I just wanted to let everyone know that I love my dad <3

There are several reasons I am reluctant to start writing:

I already have a journal
People can read what I write
I can't draw little pictures in the margins
I still haven't found the magical print button that april assured me exists
One wrong click and you lose the WHOLE thing. (which just happened)

But I want to start writing because:

Theres something about putting your raw existance into words for people you know and don't to read and think whatever they want
Having an "el jay" sounds very beatnik and cool
Sometimes I need to hear the sound of letter keys being typed into my own words
Journals written on pages and pages of thick paper are heavy and take up space
If you make a mistake, you don't have to ink the whole thing out; you'll never have to worry about people being able to read what you didn't really mean

I don't think a lot of my friends keep a steady "el jay" so thats a bummer, but I guess it doesn't really matter cause its more for me than anyone else.

Its too bad this thing doesn't have multiple fonts, because typography can really say what you want it to

p.s. I really love this little fox
